ygData.subject: Shadow Knights
ygData.msgSnippet: Overall, I am very happy with the Shadow Knight list of spells. There is only one thing that has been bothering me, which is that we don t get Gather Shadows
ygData.messageBody:
Overall, I am very happy with the Shadow Knight list of spells. There is only one thing that has been bothering me, which is that we don't get Gather Shadows until level 30. Rangers get there invisibility spell at level 15, which can also be cast on others unlike Gather Shadows, even though it is only outdoor. I definitely think that Shadow Knights are superior, but as we are evil, Gather Shadows should be a level 22 spell, if not level 15. Has this been bugging anyone else?

Tulwump, soon to be level 8 Troll SK

Remember to visit my web page at http://www.angelfire.com/nj2/shadowknight/index.html
I have been working on it for a while today, and it has been coming along nicely!
